attributes.action: Get rid of Peter Mandleson once and for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I find Mr Mandlesons comments regarding British xenophobia quite frankly just a phobia. I personally do not like Mr Brown or Mr Mandleson but by considering myself an English hetrosexual i am neither xenophbic nor homophobic and i am offended by the overphobic attitude.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
